document.discussion_title: You’ve Got Your Ultra in my Gravel Grinder
document.topic_text: You’ve Got Your Ultra in my Gravel Grinder Things that may only happen in Minnesota Ragnarök 105 meets Zumbro 100 By Chris Schotz I first found myself lined up outside Redwing, Minn., in April, 2014, for the earliest spring ride I could find.
